title: [Health] In "Lancet Oncology" scientists report that, worldwide, 4% of all newly diagnosed cancers in 2020 may be associated with alcohol use. Men accounted for more than three-quarters of those cases.
[Neuroscience] A triple threat of genetic mutations, toxic proteins and a defect in natural cell recycling could lead to treatments for neurodegenerative diseases such as Alzheimer’s and Parkinson’s
